forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere has taken on a gentle chill, wrapped in a blanket of mostly cloudy skies. The air feels soft, almost wistful, with temperatures hovering around the low sixties, ushering in a retreat to the fifties as the afternoon progresses. A mild west wind stirs lazily, whispering through the streets, inviting an ease upon those who wander. 

As dusk approaches, the clouds will linger, and a cool embrace will settle in with temperatures dipping to about fifty-one degrees by nightfall. Fog may dance along the edges of the bay, shrouding the Golden Gate Bridge in its ephemeral beauty, but the heart of the city remains visible, albeit in a subdued palette. For those stepping out, layers are the wisest choice—light sweaters or jackets will suffice against the wind and chill, perfect for a stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet moment in a cozy café. Take this time to enjoy a slow afternoon walk, allowing the city’s rhythm to unfold—perhaps stopping to savor a warm cup of coffee or a casual conversation with a friend, as the day softly transitions toward evening.
